channel.title: CyberNetSec - Mobile Security
channel.description: Latest mobile security threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: New Android Spyware "ClayRat" Spreads via Telegram, Hijacks SMS
item.description:
A new Android spyware named "ClayRat" is targeting Russian users through fake applications distributed on phishing sites and Telegram. The malware uses sophisticated techniques to bypass Android 13+ security restrictions, install itself as the default SMS handler to intercept 2FA codes, and exfiltra...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Mobile Security, Phishing

Read Full Article →

item.title: 'Datzbro' Android Trojan Targets Seniors in Global AI-Powered Facebook Scam
item.description:
A global malicious campaign is using AI-generated content to create fake **[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/)** groups that target seniors. The campaign, detailed in a CYFIRMA report, sets up convincing-looking communities for social events to lure victims into downloading a malicious Android app...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Phishing, Mobile Security

Read Full Article →

item.title: Google Rolls Out October 2025 Security Update for Pixel Devices
item.description:
Google has released its scheduled October 2025 security update for all supported Pixel devices. The update, detailed in the Pixel Update Bulletin on October 8, 2025, addresses numerous security vulnerabilities. It incorporates all patches from the broader October 2025 Android Security Bulletin, alon...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Patch Management, Mobile Security

Read Full Article →

item.title: "Maverick": New Banking Trojan Spreads via WhatsApp in Brazil
item.description:
A new and sophisticated fileless banking Trojan named "Maverick" is spreading rapidly in Brazil through a large-scale WhatsApp campaign. According to Kaspersky researchers, the malware is delivered via ZIP archives containing malicious LNK files, a method that bypasses the platform's file-blocking. ...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Phishing, Mobile Security

Read Full Article →
